channel.title: Make something like inWild [PI]
channel.description: So my question is, how does inWild or inMulti work? I'm not sure where it's located in my source but I want to replicate it and define some sort of new region like how inMulti works so I can disable the use of certain functions in the defined area. I hope you understand what I'm asking.

item.title: Make something like inWild [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Located in the Player class.

if (inWild()) {
    // Do whatever..
}
if (isInArea(x, x, y, y) {
    player.inWild = false; // or true
}

Read full topic
